item.title: Released the Corona Candlestick Chart App for Hyogo Prefecture.
item.description: # Published service https://covid19-candle-hyogo.ml The source code of GitHub is here #Motivation The published daily graph of infected persons and the cumulative graph Those who have recovered and those who have died are not deducted I think it only gives the feeling that we are constantly expanding. As I am What I would like to know is rather the “trend” Is it expanding, is it ending, or is it in a balanced state?
